mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.fans_nums AS "fansNums", a.personal_imgs AS "personalImgs", a.thumb_up_nums AS "thumbUpNums", a.work_nums AS "workNums", a.platform_imgs AS "platformImgs", a.platform_user_id AS "platformUserId", a.platform_id AS "platformId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.enable_flag AS "enableFlag"
mapper.select:
select b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', b.id as 'userId', a.fans_nums as 'fansNum', d.dict_value as 'platName' from ho_user_star a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id left join ho_dict d on d.dict_type='platType' and d.id=a.platform_id where 1=1
and a.platform_id=#{platformId}
AND b.id in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) as 'userId' from ho_user_tag where 1=1 and dict_id in #{tagId} )
order by b.create_date desc
select FROM ho_user_star a where a.${propertyName} = '${value}'
